main event: A light brown colored object, resembling a balloon, was observed circling in Berkeley, California on August 15, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed visually from the ground for about 45 minutes,The object traveled at an estimated speed between 32-135 MPH,The observer noted that the object changed direction at times,The object was visible at an estimated altitude of 23,320 feet,Two witnesses confirmed the sighting.
sighted object: light brown colored object resembling a balloon
witness description: John Harris and R Hobson, both residents of Berkeley
